mapper.insert: INSERT into BBF_APP_CONFIG (SYSTEM_ID, APP_NAME, APP_INSTANCE_NAME, CONFIG_TYPE, CONFIG_KEY, CONFIG_VALUE, CONFIG_PATH, CONFIG_SEQ ) VALUES (#{config.systemId}, #{config.appName}, #{config.appInstanceName}, #{config.configType}, #{config.configKey}, #{config.configValue}, #{config.configPath}, SEQ_BBF_APP_CONFIG.nextval )
mapper.select: select b.system_Id,b.SYSTEM_NAME,a.APP_NAME,a.APP_INSTANCE_NAME,a.CONFIG_KEY,a.CONFIG_VALUE,a.CONFIG_TYPE,a.CONFIG_PATH,a.CONFIG_SEQ from (select b.APP_NAME,a.DICT_NAME CONFIG_TYPE,b.CONFIG_SEQ ,b.CONFIG_TYPE dictfile,b.CONFIG_VALUE, b.APP_INSTANCE_NAME , b.CONFIG_KEY,b.CONFIG_PATH from BBF_APP_CONFIG b, BBF_DICT a where a.DICT_ID = b.CONFIG_TYPE) a , (select b.SYSTEM_ID system_Id, a.DICT_NAME SYSTEM_NAME,b.CONFIG_SEQ from BBF_APP_CONFIG b ,BBF_DICT a where a.DICT_ID = b.SYSTEM_ID) b where a.CONFIG_SEQ =b.CONFIG_SEQ
